Review_title: The last standout comedian of Turkish Cinema
Review_Text: The documentary is about the life of Metin Akpinar, who; along with Zeki Alasya, made the best ever duo movies and theaters about on going life of Turkish living.
Idol of my childhood Metin Akpinar..T√ºrkiye's number one actor..bless youüôè

He is a legend and I think this is an honor to be part of this documentary when he is alive. Unfortunately I couldn't see Zeki and Metin on stage but I watched their shows on VHS tape at least hundred times when I was a kid. I am so happy to see this beautiful, heartwarming documentary. 10 is not enough in my opinion.
